ch0137_00_orchid1/0101_0701_01_10:
Oho! If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You look like you’ve got a skip in your step today!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0101_0701_02_10:
Get out there and give it your all today! Lots of
sync pairs are just waiting to meet you!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0701_01_10:
Sync pairs and sync stones... Pasio sure is a
fascinating place, don’t you think?
ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0701_02_10:
When Pokémon partner with Trainers to become
sync pairs, they may show us things about
themselves that we’d otherwise never see!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0701_03_10:
This isn’t good. There’s so much to research!
I don’t think I’ll be heading home anytime soon.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_01_10:
Professor Bellis is the senior authority when it
comes to research on sync stones. She’s more up
on the subject than I am.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_02_10:
I’m actually tempted to become her assistant, just
to have her teach me what she knows!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_03_10:
Haha! Age and status don’t matter when it comes
to Pokémon research.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_04_10:
A love for Pokémon is what’s most important
for research.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_01_10:
There are sync pairs from many different regions
on Pasio.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_02_10:
I’m able to see all manner of Pokémon I could
never encounter in the Kanto region thanks to that.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_03_10:
When Trainers’ eyes meet, a battle is soon to
follow. But for me...
ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_04_10:
when something catches my eye, it’s time for some
Pokémon research!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0702_01_10:
Earlier, I had a Trainer show me their
partner Pokémon.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0702_02_10:
I got so caught up in studying their Pokémon that
there was no time left for a battle.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0702_03_10:
Make sure you manage your time wisely so you
don’t end up like me!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_01_10:
Professor Elm, Professor Rowan, myself. There are
many people researching Pokémon.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_02_10:
People like myself study Pokémon as a profession.
For some people, Pokémon are pets. Others use
them for battling.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_03_10:
There are as many ways to interact with Pokémon
as there are people and Pokémon in the world.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_04_10:
Don’t feel like you need to imitate anyone else.
Treasure the unique way you relate to your
own Pokémon!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_01_10:
Back in my youth, I was a real go-getter
Pokémon Trainer.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_02_10:
Back in those days, there was another Trainer
I knew who was unrivaled in strength and very
passionate about Pokémon battles.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_03_10:
That Trainer was Agatha! She is a member of the
Indigo Elite Four.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_04_10:
I chose the life of a Pokémon researcher, but
Agatha thought of nothing but Pokémon battles.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_05_10:
Our paths may have diverged, but I still hold her
in high esteem.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a grandson...
Erm, what was his name again?
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_02_10:
Just kidding, it’s Blue! His name is Blue. I’m sure
you’ve heard of him by now.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_03_10:
He was a bit of a mischievous boy, but he really
changed after he left Pallet Town to go on his
own Pokémon journey.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_05_10:
I’m so happy to have seen my grandson become
such a fine young man... Hoho! The new
discoveries never cease, even as I grow older!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_01_10:
I think what helped Blue grow so much was his
rival, a boy named Red.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_02_10:
I also gained experience through battling with a
certain Pokémon Trainer.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_03_10:
I wonder, do you have anyone like that in your
life? If you do, be sure to treasure that friend.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_04_10:
A friend who pushes you to newer and greater
heights is a once-in-a-lifetime treasure!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0701_01_10:
There’s something about you that reminds me of
Red, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0701_02_10:
Those eyes that sparkle, full of hope...
It’s exactly how he looked the day I handed him
his first Pokémon!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0701_03_10:
If you hold on to that sparkle, I’m sure you’ll
become a splendid Pokémon Trainer!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_01_10:
Perhaps someday you’ll even have the opportunity
to battle Red or Blue.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_02_10:
On the day I gave them their first Pokémon,
I never could have imagined how those two
would end up.
ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_03_10:
This is quite the rare opportunity. We should enjoy
it to the best of our ability!
ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_04_10:
You’ll join the battle too, won’t you? Don’t go
holding anything back now!
ch0137_00_orchid1/1701_0701_02_10:
I found a handy little something. Here, I’ll give it
to you!
ch0137_00_orchid1/1701_0702_01_10: Feel free to use it however you like!
ch0137_00_orchid1/1701_0702_02_10:
If I find something else, I’ll be sure to give it to
you. I hope you’ll look forward to it!
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], do you have any
interest in Pokémon research?
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_02_10:
Research is a lot of fun! You can become very
knowledgeable about all things Pokémon!
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_03_10:
The feeling of a new discovery that no one else
has seen is the best feeling in the world!
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_04_10:
If you’re interested, you should come stop by my
lab sometime.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_05_10:
I’d be glad to welcome someone who loves
Pokémon as much as you!
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_01_10:
Whether we’re working as Trainers or researchers,
reaching the end of our path can be very difficult.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_02_10:
But if you make your own way along the path
you’ve chosen, even the tough times are enjoyable!
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_03_10:
Once you find your path, don’t lose your way.
Face challenges with all you’ve got.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_04_10: I’ll support you all the while, of course!
ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m reminded of myself when I was younger when
I’m with you.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_02_10:
Spending my days enjoying Pokémon battles,
challenging my rival.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_03_10:
When I’m with you, that old excitement of being
a Trainer comes back to me.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_04_10:
Hoho! I don’t plan on letting you younger folk
defeat me just yet!
ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0702_01_10:
You may not end up so different from me in
the future.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0702_02_10:
Hoho! What I mean is that you’ll grow to be
someone who loves Pokémon no matter your age.
ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0702_03_10: Do your best never to lose that love for Pokémon.
ch0137_00_orchid1/3001_0701_01_10:
Ho! That skip in your step this morning reminds me
of my grandchildren.
ch0137_00_orchid1/3002_0701_01_10:
Tell me, how is your Pokémon doing?
Ah! It seems to be very happy training alongside
you today!
ch0137_00_orchid1/3003_0701_01_10:
Some people play with Pokémon; some battle with
them. Whatever the choice, we can still support
each other!
ch0137_00_orchid1/3004_0701_01_10:
You know, there just aren’t enough hours in the
day to enjoy research and exploration as much
as I’d like to!
ch0137_00_orchid1/3005_0701_01_10:
I learned so many interesting things out in the
field today! I can’t wait to record everything in
my latest report!
ch0137_00_orchid1/3006_0701_01_10:
Did you know that some Pokémon change their
behavior based on whether it’s day or night?
Observing them can be quite a challenge!
